thread.title: Department of Trade and Industry aims to fight piracy
thread.title_full: Department of Trade and Industry aims to fight piracy | News24

author: news24.com
title: Department of Trade and Industry aims to fight piracy
text:
Johannesburg - Trade and industry deputy minister Mzwandile Masina said they planned to be harsh on landlords who housed criminal activities such as the selling counterfeit goods.
Masina said this during a raid of counterfeit goods in Randburg, Johannesburg on Thursday.
Masina led the raid.
He said they planned to focus mainly on shops selling counterfeit goods in the arts and entertainment industry and added the materials were undermining artists' intellectual rights.
